sumDiscount.name: Lump sum discount information
sumDiscount.note1: Discount applies to lump sum payment by credit card or check card.
sumDiscount.note2: Credit card (installment), mobile phone payment, Kakao Pay, Naver Pay,
sumDiscount.note3: Discount is not applied when selecting Samsung Pay.
sumDiscount.note4: - Orderer's name, address, mobile phone number, landline phone number (optional),
sumDiscount.note5: E-mail (if the orderer and recipient are different, the recipient's name,
sumDiscount.note6: Address, mobile phone number, landline phone number (optional)
sumDiscount.note7: - Information about payment (account information for cash refund when withdrawing subscription, etc.)
sumDiscount.rule3: 3. Retention and use period of personal information
sumDiscount.note8: - In principle, the purpose of collecting or receiving personal information
sumDiscount.note9: Once the purpose is achieved, it will be destroyed without delay. However, in e-commerce
sumDiscount.note10: In accordance with relevant laws such as the Consumer Protection Act, etc.
sumDiscount.note11: If preservation is necessary, it will be preserved for a certain period of time.
sumDiscount.note12: - Records on contracts or cancellation of subscription, etc.: 5 years
sumDiscount.note13: - Records of payment and supply of goods, etc.: 5 years
sumDiscount.note14: - Records on consumer complaints or dispute resolution: 3 years
